stories.text:
Hello, My name is Ashwin, I'm building Airbooks app in Public. Would love to hear some suggestions/feedback/ideas.

I built the app for Solopreneurs and ran google ads through which I got a few signups and some feedback like a few users needed Accounts payable/receivable, Multiuser access, desktop version etc.

Looking to alter the app to suite SMB's. any suggestions are welcome, ex any integrations we can work on. App link- https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.airbooks
stories.title: Show HN: Feedback Please Building online/offline accounting app for SMB

stories.text:
I got an email from Google that they still owe me some money. Great!

I open adsense and go to https://www.google.com/adsense/new/u/0/pub-9584829766861177/payments but I get an error.

I submitted this in the useless help forum: https://support.google.com/adsense/thread/131527501/i-can-t-view-my-payments-because-of-an-error?hl=en ... But i am not expecting much.

Other issues are reporting this issue too

What magic spell do I need to reach a capable person at Google?
stories.title: How to reach Google with adsense payment issues?
